full_threads.body:
Thanks for the update Joel.

Kind regards,

Selene Di Prisco

Head of Business Operations

Phone | 02 6185 5580

www.lineleader.com/en-au

Hi Selene,

We have updated the form. We have removed the 2nd child enquiry to comments section.
@joel Can you please remove the child 2 mapping.

action.text: Heath Maguire moved this conversation from the Unknown Mailbox inbox

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath,


Katerina has requested now that we are mapping Child 2 to the child section that we no longer map these details to the comments, is that possible?


Kind regards,


Selene Di Prisco

Head of Business Operations

Phone | 02 6185 5580

www.lineleader.com/en-au





From: Enrol Little Scribblers <enrol@littlescribblers.com.au>
Sent: Wednesday, 30 October 2024 9:13 AM
To: Selene DiPrisco <sdiprisco@lineleader.com>
Cc: Renee Eyles <renee@littlescribblers.com.au>
Subject: Re: CRM check


Hi Selene,

Great! Yes, please remove the Child 2 details from the comments. And including the address in all SMS messages related to tours would be perfect, so let's add it to both the Tour Confirmation and Tour Reminder messages.


Kind regards,

Katerina Konjarski
Enrolments Consultant
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

HEAD OFFICE - Centre of Excellence
106 Russell Avenue
Dolls Point NSW 2219


M: 1300 300 011
E: enrol@littlescribblers.com.au
Web: www.littlescribblers.com.au

Where Education, is Beyond Imagination



On Tue, Oct 29, 2024 at 5:12 PM Selene DiPrisco <sdiprisco@lineleader.com> wrote:

Hi Katerina,

Oh fantastic, great to hear! Did you want the Child 2 details removed from the comments now then?

Good suggestion on the address, did you want this in all SMS, or just those that send out regarding the Tour i.e. Tour Confirmation and Tour Reminder?

Kind regards,

Selene Di Prisco

Head of Business Operations

Phone | 02 6185 5580

www.lineleader.com/en-au

From: Enrol Little Scribblers <enrol@littlescribblers.com.au>
Sent: Tuesday, 29 October 2024 2:52 PM
To: Renee Eyles <renee@littlescribblers.com.au>
Cc: Selene DiPrisco <sdiprisco@lineleader.com>
Subject: Re: CRM check

Hi Selene,
I hope this message finds you well!
I wanted to let you know that Heath has fixed the issue with Child 2. However, I noticed that it is still showing up in the notes.
Additionally, could we please include the address for each centre in the SMS communications? That would be really helpful for families.




Kind regards,

Katerina Konjarski
Enrolments Consultant
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

HEAD OFFICE - Centre of Excellence
106 Russell Avenue
Dolls Point NSW 2219

M: 1300 300 011

E: enrol@littlescribblers.com.au

Web: www.littlescribblers.com.au

Where Education, is Beyond Imagination

Thank you


Kind Regards,

Renee Eyles-Oberg

Head of Sales & Marketing

HEAD OFFICE - Centre of Excellence
106 Russell Avenue
Dolls Point NSW 2219

T: 0461422 666
E: renee@littlescribblers.com.au
Web: www.littlescribblers.com.au



On 28 Oct 2024, at 3:38 PM, Selene DiPrisco <sdiprisco@lineleader.com> wrote:

Hi Renee & Katerina,

See my notes and feedback below.

  • I will follow-up with Heath regarding the mapping of the second child
  • Is the second questions regarding Tours? If so, please assign the Tours to the correct Centre Manager. When this occurs, they will receive a reminder emails regarding the tours
  • Can you please clarify the feedback/question regarding the Beaconsfield centre? Is this recording a second child being manually added? If so, this will be updated soon by Heath

See below all the staff accounts for the Centre Managers at the centres listed below. A verification email has been sent to the email listed. Once the email is verified they can use the Username and Password to Login.

Little Scribblers Beaconsfield

Verification Email: beaconsfield@littlescribblers.com.au

U: Kate.Nye

P: Password123

Little Scribblers ELC Belmore

Verification Email: belmoresupervisor@littlescribblers.com.au

U: Sewani.Gupta

P: Password123

P: Password123

P: Password123


Can you please provide me the Contact details below, for the locations listed: Ashfield, Brighton, Brookvale, Dingley and Moorloorbark. Can you please update the spreadsheet attached.

Staff Information

Location Director Email

Location Director Recovery Email

Location Director Phone Number

Kind regards,

Selene Di Prisco

Head of Business Operations

www.lineleader.com/en-au

<image006.png>

From: Renee Eyles <renee@littlescribblers.com.au>
Sent: Monday, 28 October 2024 1:06 PM
To: Selene DiPrisco <sdiprisco@lineleader.com>
Subject: Fwd: CRM check

Hi Selene,

Please see feedback from Katerina below.

Thank you

Renee

Sent from my iPhone


Begin forwarded message:

From: Enrol Little Scribblers <enrol@littlescribblers.com.au>
Date: 28 October 2024 at 12:57:52 PM AEDT
To: Renee Eyles <renee@littlescribblers.com.au>
Subject: Re: CRM check

﻿

Hi Renee,

I hope you had a lovely weekend too!

I've completed the CRM check for all our centres and noticed that the second child doesn't show up under the children section; instead, it appears under the notes section. I've attached a photo from my tests for the Brookvale, Caringbah, Mooroolbark 1 and Dingley centres for your reference.

I also have a question: is the calendar linked to the centre director's email address, so I don't have to manually add them myself?

Additionally, regarding the Beaconsfield centre, I received a new enquiry from Renae Turimnell, and while only Ella showed up, I manually added Annika.

Please let me know if you need anything else or if there are any further tests you would like me to conduct.

Thank you.

<image007.png><image008.png><image009.png> <image008.png>

Kind regards,

Katerina Konjarski
Enrolments Consultant
Little Scribblers Early Learning Centres

HEAD OFFICE - Centre of Excellence
106 Russell Avenue
Dolls Point NSW 2219

M: 1300 300 011

E: enrol@littlescribblers.com.au

Web: www.littlescribblers.com.au

Where Education, is Beyond Imagination

Thank you
Renee
